name: Dashed
description:
This game was made in 48 hours as a submission to the 2021 Games Den Quick Game Jam. Race your way around the track, avoid getting dashed on the rocks! LAN multiplayer is available on the downloadable versions. Unfortunately, the Web version can only be player in single player by selecting host at the main menu. Controls:
W A D or < /\ >

This game might receive updates in the future if there is interest, please leave a comment if this is something you would like to see.
